languages.text: Под вашим влиянием Соломон стал служить закону, руководствуясь своей яростью и гордыней.
Under your influence, Solomorne began to allow his rage and pride to guide his actions when serving the law.
languages.original_text: Под вашим влиянием Соломон стал служить закону, руководствуясь своей яростью и гордыней.

traits.locale_text: Under your influence, Solomorne began to allow his rage and pride to guide his actions when serving the law.

languages.text: あなたの影響を受けて、ソロモーンは法に仕える際に、自らの怒りと誇りに行動を導かせるようになった。
languages.original_text: Under your influence, Solomorne began to allow his rage and pride to guide his actions when serving the law.

traits.locale_text: あなたの影響を受けて、ソロモーンは法に仕える際に、自らの怒りと誇りに行動を導かせるようになった。

languages.text: Unter deinem Einfluss begann Solomorne, seinem Zorn und Stolz im Dienste des Gesetzes freien Lauf zu lassen.
languages.original_text: Under your influence, Solomorne began to allow his rage and pride to guide his actions when serving the law.

traits.locale_text: Unter deinem Einfluss begann Solomorne, seinem Zorn und Stolz im Dienste des Gesetzes freien Lauf zu lassen.

languages.text: Sous votre influence, Solomorne a commencé à se laisser guider par la rage et la fierté lorsqu'il fait appliquer la loi.
languages.original_text: Under your influence, Solomorne began to allow his rage and pride to guide his actions when serving the law.

traits.locale_text: Sous votre influence, Solomorne a commencé à se laisser guider par la rage et la fierté lorsqu'il fait appliquer la loi.

languages.text: Debido a tu influencia, Solomorne empezó a dejar que su furia y su orgullo guiasen sus actos al servicio de la ley.
languages.original_text: Under your influence, Solomorne began to allow his rage and pride to guide his actions when serving the law.

traits.locale_text: Debido a tu influencia, Solomorne empezó a dejar que su furia y su orgullo guiasen sus actos al servicio de la ley.

languages.text: 在你的影响下，索罗蒙任由怒火与傲慢指引，通过这种方式为帝国律法效力。
languages.original_text: Under your influence, Solomorne began to allow his rage and pride to guide his actions when serving the law.

traits.locale_text: 在你的影响下，索罗蒙任由怒火与傲慢指引，通过这种方式为帝国律法效力。

languages.text: Senden etkilenen Solomorne, artık kanunlara hizmet ederken öfkesinin ve gururunun ona yön göstermesine müsaade etti.
languages.original_text: Under your influence, Solomorne began to allow his rage and pride to guide his actions when serving the law.

traits.locale_text: Senden etkilenen Solomorne, artık kanunlara hizmet ederken öfkesinin ve gururunun ona yön göstermesine izin verir."
